liveServerSpeed.language.description: Language used by the extension (en, fr, es, de) (Settings will change language after restarting VS Code)
liveServerSpeed.debounceTime.description: Debounce time in milliseconds for file change detection and instant preview updates (50-1000ms)
liveServerSpeed.relaunchShortcut.descrip: Default keyboard shortcut for relaunching the server with last parameters (user can override in keybindings.json)
liveServerSpeed.openKeybindings.descript: Open Keyboard Shortcuts for Live Server Speed Edition (set to true to open)
